summary: This is a declaration by Alyssa Anderson, Custodian of Records for Oath Holdings Inc. (formerly Yahoo Holdings, Inc.), submitted in response to a December 19, 2018 subpoena. It certifies the authenticity of attached user account data (profiles and login records) from Yahoo services, produced as part of an investigation.

persons.name: Alyssa Anderson
persons.role: Custodian of Records for Oath Holdings Inc.
persons.context: She is the authorized declarant who submits this business records declaration in response to a subpoena, certifying the authenticity of Yahoo user account data.

events.title: Subpoena Issued for Yahoo Account Information
events.description: A subpoena was issued requesting user account data from Oath Holdings Inc. (formerly Yahoo Holdings, Inc.) as part of an investigation.

events.title: Declaration of Records Custodian Filed
events.description: Alyssa Anderson, Custodian of Records for Oath Holdings Inc., signed and dated this declaration certifying the production of user account data in response to the subpoena.

keyFacts: A subpoena dated December 19, 2018, was issued to Oath Holdings Inc. (formerly Yahoo) for user account information as part of an investigation.
Alyssa Anderson, as Custodian of Records, certified the production of user profile data and login/authentication event records from Yahoo's systems.
The data was produced automatically by Yahoo's Account Management Tool and Login Tracker Tool and is maintained in the regular course of business.
The declaration is made under penalty of perjury pursuant to Federal Rules of Evidence and California evidence code.
The document indicates investigative efforts to obtain digital records, likely related to identifying or tracking individuals of interest.
